text:
#Covid19 fixes for #Germany:
1) Make #testing & limited #quarantines central again to contain spikes + test in all #schools #daycare to keep open
2) Set triggers for #lockdown & #opening, clear to #public
3) Simplify #vaccine implementation to reach 20% rapidly, incl #AstraZeneca https://t.co/SZPbAq9MaZ
